amendment.description: To make United States nationals eligible for appointment to the Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2505 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2505 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12595) To make United States nationals eligible for appointment to the Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2505 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2505 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inouye.
